name: Dark mode for robloxdev.com (v1.0.3)
description:
wiki.roblox.com has been completely redesigned and has been moved to robloxdev.com. With this happening, I decided to make a dark mode for it. If you have any issues or concerns please message me here or in Roblox (Fighter169mobile). Thank you for trying this out!

PS: Search my username in Google it's filtered in Roblox.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here.

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)
